recipes.name: Red Bean Salad Ranchero
recipes.author: Jane Larson

ingredients.label: Ingredients
list: ½ cup diced sharp Cheddar cheese

ingredients.label: Dressing
list: ½ cup olive oil or salad oil

recipes.instructions: Mix dressing together. Mix beans, celery, onion, cheese, olives, parsely, tomato, green chiles, and dressing. Cover and refrigerate 1-3 hours.

recipes.name: Dad's Shrimp Dip
recipes.author: Ronald Larson

ingredients.label: Ingredients
list: 1 can medium deveined shrimp, drained and rinsed

recipes.instructions: Mix cream cheese, green onions, garlic salt, lemon juice and worcestershire. Spread cream cheese mixture onto a dinner plate and top with cocktail sauce. Add the shrimp and top with parsley.

recipes.name: Vegetable Cream Cheese
recipes.author: Jane Larson
recipes.instructions: Let cream cheese soften a bit, then mix with vegetables and salt.
